sentences.en: As the ultimate existence and power, the Deity is surely of Good.
sentences.cn: 作为终极存在和力量的神, 必然是善的.

sentences.en: Bush was originally 10 side here is the local skies Taoist deity.
sentences.cn: 这里原是十方丛林,是云游道士挂单的地方.

sentences.en: Deity of Men! Goddess of Women! Where Thou gazest, the Dead live!
sentences.cn: 男子之神, 女子之女神! 汝凝视之处, 死者复生!

sentences.en: Deity series wine is characteristic of obvious delicately sweet.
sentences.cn: 帝庭系列葡萄酒拥有明显的柔滑、柔顺、柔和、圆润特色.

sentences.en: Even In my behind the deity animal also had a little worried.
sentences.cn: 连我身后的神兽也不安分起来.

sentences.en: It is shown how the Deity gives life from water.
sentences.cn: 它告诉我们神如何把生命借由水赐给(我们).

sentences.en: LIKE a deity , radio spectrum is invisible, omnipresent and commands awesome power.
sentences.cn: 无线电波像神明一样, 无法看到而又无处不在,并拥有让世人敬畏的力量.

sentences.en: Many animals were seen as the manifestation of a deity.
sentences.cn: 许多动物被看作神的化身.

sentences.en: Only the deity of the ruined temple remains unworshipped in deathless neglect.
sentences.cn: 只有破庙的神遗留在无人礼拜的,不死的冷淡之中.

sentences.en: The cross-legged deity exudes wisdom and composure.
sentences.cn: 盘腿而坐的神像散发出智慧与沉静的气息。

sentences.en: The deity was hidden in the deepest recesses of the temple.
sentences.cn: 神藏在庙宇壁龛的最深处.

sentences.en: The Hebrew prophets developed the concept of one God, a national deity.
sentences.cn: 希伯来的先知们逐渐发展了一神论, 这个神是全民族的神.

sentences.en: There is a sense of personal attachment between this image of the deity and the family.
sentences.cn: 神像和家族之间存在着一种亲切的依恋之感.

sentences.en: There is a tremendous difference in strategy between playing Deity and Chieftain.
sentences.cn: 在神级和酋长级难度下存在着巨大的差异.
